name: Aavegotchi Battler MVP web build
description:
Quick controls explanation: Click on gotchis (friendly or unfriendly) to view stats in the gotchi info panel

Click the dropdown box on the info panel to set gotchi behavior to Melee or Ranged. Melee will get up close to their target, Ranged will attempt to stay at the edge of their range stat to their current target.

Each primary stat (AGG, NRG, SPK, BRN) raises one secondary stat and lowers another (the two stats right next to it in the gotchi info panel)

Drag store gotchis to the left sidebar to acquire them

Drag inventory items to the correct gotchi slot in a gotchi info panel to equip

Drag item away from slot to unequip

Press one of the three arrows at the right of the screen to preview a battle

Press ESC to return to inventory from battle preview screen

Drag gotchis to battlefield and press FIGHT to begin battle

Right click and drag on a placed gotchi in the battle preview to set their supported gotchi to another teammate. They will target the teammate with any abilities that can be cast on allies, and set their target to be the same as their supported gotchi.

Stepping on Alchemica gives a corresponding status until you step on another type. FUD: 2x armor, 1/2 speed. FOMO: 2x speed, lose health over time. ALPHA: take 2x damage, cooldowns are 1x faster. KEK: no status. It's a "high ground" for projectiles: if your projectile didn't start on KEK, it will vanish when it travels over a kek tile.
